pos_mean_info_list.mean: 使惊奇；意外发现（surprise的ing形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 吃惊；对...惊讶；对某事感到惊奇

bilingual.source: She had a surprised expression on her face.
bilingual.target: 她的脸上露出了惊讶的表情。

bilingual.source: Tina was surprised that the boss was not the old man who interviewed her several days ago.
bilingual.target: 蒂娜感到惊讶的是，老板不是几天前面试她的那个老人。

bilingual.source: She looked at him with a surprised expression on her face.
bilingual.target: 她看着他，脸上带着惊讶的表情。

bilingual.source: I'm surprised that he went public with that.
bilingual.target: 令我惊讶的是他将之公诸于众。

bilingual.source: Eg: I am surprised at the surprising news.
bilingual.target: 翻译：我对这个令人惊讶的消息吃惊。

bilingual.source: You'd be surprised. I'll tell you a story.
bilingual.target: 你会很惊讶的。我给你讲个故事。

bilingual.source: She is surprised to find the front gate is open.
bilingual.target: 她感到惊讶的是前门开着.

bilingual.source: I am surprised you give countenance to such conduct.
bilingual.target: 我惊讶的是你竟赞成这种做法。

bilingual.source: What has surprised you the most about ancient Egyptian tattooing?
bilingual.target: 古埃及纹身最使你惊讶的是什么？

bilingual.source: As a novice, you'll be surprised how your dog moves and even more surprised at the way in which the sheep move.
bilingual.target: 做为新手，狗的表现可以让你惊讶万分，但更让你惊讶的是羊群的动作。

yingyinNormal.en: He surprised me a lot on this performance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他的表演惊艳到我了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I can't say any of us were surprised.
yingyinNormal.zh: 老实说，我们一点也不惊讶。

yingyinNormal.en: Simba. I'm a little surprised to see you alive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 辛巴！ 看到你还活着，真让我有一点惊讶。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm surprised you aren't selling "hodo" t-shirts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真意外你居然没卖"死得值"这衣服。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm surprised you didn't go home wearing your lunch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真奇怪你没把午饭带回家。

yingyinNormal.en: Howard, that's brilliant. I'm surprised you saw that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德，聪明啊，你居然想到了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm surprised you have an appetite after meeting with Dunbar.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很惊讶你在见过邓巴之后居然还有胃口。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm surprised. That story doesn't exactly revere family values.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个故事可跟家庭价值没什么关系。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm humbled, sir. And honestly surprised that you'd consider me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我自愧不配，先生，您愿考虑我，我着实震惊。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't act so surprised. Then there's courage, loyalty, both high.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别表现得这么惊讶。还有勇气和忠诚，都很高。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't seem surprised.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看起来并不惊讶

yingyinNormal.en: Shh! Don't tell me. I want to be surprised. Okay, I won't say a word. Hmm. You will definitely be surprised.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别告诉我，我想大吃一惊。好吧，我一个字也不说，你绝对会大吃一惊的。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm surprised he hasn't tried to drag you in. My God, he has.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他竟然没想拉你下水吗？天哪，他还真这么干了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm surprised Sheldon's not up here playing with all your new toys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很意外谢尔顿居然不来这里玩你的新玩具。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you are. But I'm still surprised you weren't cast as the baby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，但我还是真惊讶苏菲居然没让你扮婴儿耶稣。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello. Hey. Oh my God. Ross, are you in England? Was Emily surprised?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪！你在英国吗？艾蜜莉惊喜吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Grand. No mush. Just throw me. Wait. You surprised me today, lunkhead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈，别煽情了，把我丢过去吧。等等，你今天让我另眼相看，呆子。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey. Listen, I heard about the engagement. Surprised? And confused.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿。嘿，我听说订婚的事了。惊讶吧？而且很困惑。

yingyinNormal.en: I think you'll be surprised at how many people know exactly who you are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得到时你肯定会惊讶于会有那么多人能认出你。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: But don't be surprised if you walk out here and catch me doing it myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但如果你出房间时撞见我正在自己解决可别吓着。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 惊奇的; 觉得意外的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 出人意料的；意外的；奇怪的；令人惊讶的
adj. 惊奇的；惊讶的；感觉意外的；觉得奇怪的
adv. 惊人地；出人意外地

word_family.mean: n. 意想不到的事件；一种复杂的敲奏编钟的方法；惊奇；诧异；出乎意料

sense_info_list.zh: 惊奇的; 觉得意外的

examination_example.sentence: People have been <highlight>surprised</highlight> to see evidence that Victorians had fun and could, and did, laugh.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们惊讶地发现，有证据表明维多利亚时代的人玩得很开心，而且可以并确实笑了。

examination_example.sentence: Trust me, you'll be <highlight>surprised</highlight> to see how much people are willing to share if you just ask.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相信我，你会惊奇地发现，如果你直接问，有多少人愿意分享。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps we should not be so <highlight>surprised</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许我们不应该如此惊讶。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 意外的; 惊讶的; 诧异的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adv. 惊奇地；诧异地；吃惊地
adv. 惊人地；出人意外地

sense_info_list.zh: 意外的; 惊讶的; 诧异的

examination_example.sentence: Tina was <highlight>surprised</highlight> that the boss was not the old man who interviewed her several days ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蒂娜很惊讶老板不是几天前面试她的那个老人。

examination_example.sentence: She was <highlight>surprised</highlight> to hear about her mistake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听到自己的错误，她很诧异。

examination_example.sentence: The son felt <highlight>surprised</highlight> but he did as his father said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 儿子感到很诧异，但他还是照他父亲说的做了。
